t: Popular Canyon mountain bike models are now available for purchase on Amazon.com - Singletracks Mountain Bike News
s: May 1, 2025 - In October, Singletracks reported that REI was named an Authorized Service Provider for Canyon, an arrangement that made it easier for customers to service and find parts for Canyon bikes. Canyon is one of the first major bike brands to sell via Amazon in the US.
